0KM.F.summary: Lentex S.A. manufactures and sells flexible PVC floor coverings for residential and commercial areas, and sports facilities in Poland and internationally. It also offers nonwovens fabrics, including nonwoven interlinings, waddings, and spunlace fabrics, as well as mats for use in various applications, such as sanitary, technical, automotive, construction, furniture, clothing, shoe making, agricultural, filtration, and others. The company was founded in 1911 and is based in Lubliniec, Poland.
